title: Killers - Season 3

Killers - Season 3

â€œKillersâ€ tells the surprising story of how some of the worldâ€™s most infamous murderers were brought to justice. Itâ€™s a story of shocking crimes and bizarrely simple blunders that takes you behind the well-worn stereotype of the criminal mastermind to reveal the very ordinary men who commit the most heinous crimes.

Through remarkable archive, exclusive interviews, police files and stylish reconstruction, follow the murderersâ€™ stories from their childhood to their prison cell. Each episode explores the mistakes that led to their arrest, demystifying some of historyâ€™s most appalling criminals and revealing the truth behind their crimes.
